Allowed.ErrorMsg: The password must have only allowed characters [non-space printable ASCII table]

Special.ErrorMsg: The password must have at least {0} special characters [{1}]

Lowercase.ErrorMsg: The password must have at least {0} lowercase characters [a-z]

Uppercase.ErrorMsg: The password must have at least {0} uppercase characters [A-Z]

Numeric.ErrorMsg: The password must have at least {0} numeric characters [0-9]

Length.ErrorMsg: The password must have a length between {0} and {1} characters

NotRepeated.ErrorMsg: The password must not have any reapeated characters
